explains: adj. 普通的，朴实无华的；相貌平平的；像家一样舒适的；（女子）热情亲切的，家庭主妇型的

sentences.en: His landlady was a kind, homely woman.
sentences.cn: 他的房东太太心地善良，待人亲切。

sentences.en: The hotel has a lovely homely feel to it.
sentences.cn: 那家旅馆给人一种宾至如归的感觉。

sentences.en: He went to the beautiful old Shaker dresser that graced this homely room.
sentences.cn: 他走向那个使这间陋室生辉的漂亮的夏克尔式旧橱柜。
